name: SeamBI
overview:
SeamBI is an advertising technology innovator. We work with cable networks and broadcasters, enabling brands to seamlessly integrate their product or message into existing television, film and Internet content. Our proprietary technology guarantees advertisers DVR-proof, targeted audience exposure, without compromising content integrity. With SeamBI, advertisers can work in concert with on-air and on-line campaigns, complementing and reinforcing their marketing message with digital brand integration during the programming itself.

While digital product placement is not new, SeamBI is the first company to turn digital brand integration into a scalable business that benefits both local and national advertisers. Since 2009, our solution has been widely deployed with syndicators, international distributors, television stations, and broadcast networks.

Thousands of insertions have been delivered to broadcasters and more than 100 advertisers have used the SeamBI system in the past year alone. Major advertisers that regularly leverage our patented technology include Toyota, Sony Pictures, McDonald’s, Geico, and many more.

SeamBI was founded in 2006 by Roy Baharav, Guy Morgenstern and Dr. Miky Tamir. Warren Littlefield, former President of NBC Entertainment, is a senior advisor to SeamBI. Bob Cook, former President of 20th Television, is our Special Content Distribution Expert
